Verses: 1 appozhudhu Themaaniyanaagiya Elippaas Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 oru Manushan Vivegiyaayirundhu, Thanakkuththaan Prayojanamaayirukkiradhinaal Dhevanukkup Prayojanamaayiruppaano?
3 neer Needhimaanaayiruppadhinaal Sarvavallavarukku Nanmaiyundaagumo? Neer Ummudaiya Vazhigalai Uththamamaakkugiradhu Avarukku Aadhaayamaayirukkumo?
4 avar Umakku Bayandhu Ummode Vazhakkaadi, Ummode Nyaayaththukku Varuvaaro?
5 ummudaiya Pollaappu Periyadhum, Ummudaiya Akkiramangal Mudivillaadhavaigalumaai Irukkiradhallavo?
6 mugaandharamillaamal Ummudaiya Sagodharar Kaiyil Adaguvaangi, Ezhaigalin Vasthirangalaip Pariththukkondeer.
7 vidaaiththavanukkuth Thaagaththukkuth Thanneer Kodaamalum, Pasiththavanukkup Pojanam Kodaamalum Poneer.
8 palavaanukke Dhesaththil Idamundaayitru; Ganavaan Adhil Kudiyerinaan.
9 vidhavaigalai Verumaiyaai Anuppivitteer; Thaaithagappan Illaadhavargalin Buyangal Murikkappattadhu.
10 aagaiyaal Kannigal Ummai Soozhndhirukkiradhu; Asuppile Umakku Vandha Bayangaram Ummaik Kalangappannugiradhu.
11 neer Paarkkakkoodaadhapadikku Irul Vandhadhu, Jalappiravaagam Ummai Moodugiradhu.
12 dhevan Paralogaththin Unnadhangalilirukkiraar Allavo? Natchaththirangalin Uyaraththaip Paarum, Avaigal Eththanai Uyaramaayirukkiradhu.
13 neer: Dhevan Eppadi Arivaar, Andhagaaraththukku Appuraththilirukkiravar Nyaayam Visaarikkakkoodumo?
14 avar Paaraadhapadikku Megangal Avarukku Maraivaayirukkiradhu; Paramandalangalin Sakkaraththile Avar Ulaavugiraar Endru Sollugireer.
15 akkirama Maandhar Poorvaththil Nadandha Maarkkaththai Gavaniththup Paarththeero?
16 kaalam Varumunne Avargal Vaadipponaargal; Avargaludaiya Asthibaaraththinmel Vellam Purandadhu.
17 dhevan Avargal Veedugalai Nanmaiyaal Nirappiyirundhaalum, Avargal Avarai Nokki: Engalaivittu Vilagum, Sarvavallavaraale Engalukku Enna Aagum Endraargal.
18 aagaiyaal Dhunmaarkkarin Aalosanai Enakku Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga.
19 engal Nilaimai Nirmoolamaagaamal, Avargalukku Meedhiyaanadhaiyo Akkini Patchiththadhenbadhai Needhimaangal Kandu Sandhoshappadugiraargal.
20 kutramillaadhavan Avargalaip Paarththu Nagaikkiraan.
21 neer Avarode Pazhagi Samaadhaanamaayirum; Adhinaal Umakku Nanmai Varum.
22 avar Vaayinindru Pirandha Vedhappramaanaththai Etrukkondu, Avar Vaarththaigalai Ummudaiya Irudhayaththil Vaiththukkollavendugiren.
23 neer Sarvavallavaridaththil Mananthirumbinaal, Thirumbak Kattappaduveer; Akkiramaththai Umadhu Koodaaraththukku Dhooramaakkuveer.
24 appozhudhu Thoolaippol Ponnaiyum, Aatruk Karkalaippol Oppeerin Thangaththaiyum Serththu Vaippeer.
25 appozhudhu Sarvavallavar Thaame Umakkup Pasumponnum, Umakku Sokka Velliyumaayiruppaar.
26 appozhudhu Sarvavallavarmel Manamagizhchchiyaayirundhu, Dhevanukku Neraaga Ummudaiya Mugaththai Ereduppeer.
27 neer Avarai Nokki Vinnappampanna, Avar Umakku Sevikoduppaar; Appozhudhu Neer Ummudaiya Poruththanaigalai Seluththuveer.
28 neer Oru Kaariyaththai Nirunayampanninaal, Adhu Umakku Nilaivarappadum; Ummudaiya Paadhaigalil Velichcham Pragaasikkum.
29 manushar Odukkappadumpodhu Thidappadakkadavargal Endru Neer Solla, Thaazhndhor Ratchikkappaduvaargal.
30 kutramatriraadhavanaiyunkoodath Thappuvippaar; Ummudaiya Kaigalin Suththaththinimiththam Avan Thappippovaan Endraan.
